text: waʿada l-lahu alladhina amanu minkum waʿamilu l-salihati layastakhlifannahum fi l-ardi kama is'takhlafa alladhina min qablihim walayumakkinanna lahum dinahumu alladhi ir'tada lahum walayubaddilannahum min baʿdi khawfihim amnan yaʿbudunani la yush'rikuna bi shayan waman kafara baʿda dhalika fa-ulaika humu l-fasiquna
